name: Baseball Tycoon
description:
In this fun management & simulation game, your goal is to build, maintain, and manage an entire baseball club.

You will manage the club, the team and gear shop. Attract tourists into the club, sell tickets and collect training funds to make money, and use the revenue to build more training venues!

As a BOSS, you are responsible for every things of this club to ensure normal operations and profit growth! You can make the club very large and give visitors a variety of training modes! Yes, When the time is right, you can form a baseball team to participate in the game to get more generous bonuses, allowing your club to expand rapidly.

Manage a baseball club of your own. Keep it profitable while recruiting more and more baseball players, till one day you could form a baseball team to participate in the game! Challenge the champion and be a Tycoon!

Create your own "baseball kingdom" by yourself!
You will become the leader of a baseball club!
Enjoy The Fun Of Baseball Games Via Baseball Tycoon!
Lovely style, lovely management!
